name: Reimu the Boomer
description:
It's a snowy winter's day, and all the youkai are out to play. You know what that means:

It's time for Reimu to kill everyone's fun!

Cite them for OSHA violations, or use archaic legal technicalities to get those whippersnappers off your damn lawn!

But be quick: if you can't kill everyone's fun by 12:16 PM, then you won't be able to enjoy your afternoon drinking hot chocolate in the utter desolate silence of a snow day with nobody outside!

This is a point-and-click game made for Touhou Jam 10 (https://itch.io/jam/touhou-jam-10). There are no long philosophical dialogues this time. Instead, you can get a close look into American housing and urban development policy!

This game was developed using Suzunoya, a visual novel engine, and Danmokou, a bullet hell engine. Click on "Licenses" from the main menu ingame to view licenses.

Please contact me (Bagoum#4773) on Discord for feedback or anything else.
